alert.note: Alert for Coastal Del Norte; Mendocino Coast; Northern Humboldt Coast; Southwestern Humboldt; Southwestern Mendocino Interior (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Frost Advisory issued November 13 at 10:45PM PST until November 14 at 9:00AM PST by NWS Eureka
info.description: ...FROST ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 3 AM TO 9 AM PST MONDAY... * WHAT...Temperatures as low as 36 will result in frost formation. * WHERE...Coastal Del Norte, Northern Humboldt Coast, Southwestern Humboldt, Mendocino Coast and Southwestern Mendocino Interior Counties. * WHEN...From 3 AM to 9 AM PST Monday. * IMPACTS...Frost could kill sensitive outdoor vegetation if left uncovered.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. Frost Advisories and Freeze Warnings are issued during the local growing season as defined by climatology and local agriculture authorities. Once the growing season has ended these statements will no longer be issued until the spring.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Del Norte; Mendocino Coast; Northern Humboldt Coast; Southwestern Humboldt; Southwestern Mendocino Interior
